job_description:
About Us
We are a leading resort management company committed to delivering exceptional vacation experiences and maximizing the value of our resort assets. We are seeking an experienced Director of Inventory & Yield Management to lead our efforts in optimizing revenue performance across our portfolio.

Position Summary
The Director of Inventory & Yield Management will oversee the strategy and execution of inventory allocation, pricing, and revenue optimization across our resorts. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in hotel or timeshare inventory and yield management and a deep understanding of distribution channels, market dynamics, and revenue strategies specific to the hospitality industry.

Key Responsibilities

Develop and execute inventory and yield management strategies to maximize occupancy, RevPAR, and overall profitability.
Monitor, analyze, and forecast demand trends, booking pace, and competitive performance to drive pricing and availability decisions.
Manage inventory distribution across direct, OTA, GDS, and timeshare exchange channels to optimize utilization.
Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams to align revenue strategies with business goals.
Oversee system configuration, rate loading, and channel connectivity in PMS, CRS, and RMS platforms.
Establish reporting dashboards to monitor performance metrics and provide actionable insights to senior leadership.
Lead regular revenue strategy meetings to review performance and adjust tactics as needed.
Ensure compliance with contractual obligations for owner, exchange, and rental inventory allocations.
Provide leadership and training to property-level revenue teams to strengthen yield management capabilities across the portfolio.
Qualifications

Minimum of 7+ years of experience in inventory and yield/revenue management within the hotel or timeshare industry (required).
Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality, Business, Finance, or related field (Master’s preferred).
Strong analytical and forecasting skills with expertise in hospitality revenue management systems (RMS, PMS, CRS).
Proven ability to manage multi-property portfolios and complex distribution strategies.
Excellent communication, leadership, and cross-functional collaboration skills.
Results-oriented, with the ability to balance strategic thinking and tactical execution.
Why Join Us

Opportunity to shape revenue strategies for a diverse and growing resort portfolio.
Collaborative work environment with a focus on innovation and results.
Competitive compensation and benefits package.
How to Apply
Interested candidates should submit their resume and cover letter.

Job Type: Full-time
